ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:45:52 [Issue ID 4000-816393] urn:comicvine:4000-816393 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:35:52. [Issue ID 2161700]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The creative powerhouses behind the bestselling, critically acclaimed GOD COUNTRY, Thanos Wins, and REDNECK returns for the biggest launch of the year.
Imagine everything you thought was fantasy...was real. And now join us, in a world where reality is dead...and anything is possible...
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Geoff Shaw & Dave Stewart | 1 | | B | Cover B | Ryan Stegman & Dee Cunniffe | 3 | | C | Cover C | Geoff Shaw | 4 | | D | Blank Cover D | None | 5 | | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Daniel Warren Johnson | 6 | | F | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Tradd Moore | 7 | | G | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Ryan Ottley | 8 | | H | 1:75 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Raw) | Geoff Shaw | 9 | | I | 1:100 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Raw) | Ryan Stegman | 10 | | J | 1:200 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Infinity Raw) | Geoff Shaw | 11 | | RE | Hive Comics/Nerd Store Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover | John Gallagher | 2 |
*Notes:* The 1:50 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of The Walking Dead #1.
ComicInfo.Title: Kids Love Chains, Part One
